scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:clinical" "npm run dev:business" "npm run dev:data" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:clinical && npm run build:business && npm run build:data && npm run build:clients
scripts.build:clients: cd clients/web-dashboard && npm run build && cd ../mobile-app && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:clinical && npm run test:business && npm run test:data
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:microservices && npm run install:clients
scripts.install:microservices: cd microservices/clinical && npm install && cd ../business && npm install && cd ../data && npm install
scripts.install:clients: cd clients/web-dashboard && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install
